snippet.title: Castle of Alchemist - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724770/Castle_Of_Alchemists/

Exciting news! Our team has been hard at work for the past 2 years developing Castle of Alchemists, and we're thrilled to announce that the early access version will be available on March 17th! As the alchemically enhanced super soldier, Bellator, you'll take on an epic battle to save the castle from malicious creatures that have been unleashed into our world. With strategic traps, powerful weapons, and defensive towers at your disposal, you'll have to use every trick in the book to survive. Check out our new trailer and wishlist now to be the first to play this innovative tower defense and top-down action hybrid game.

#indiegame #castleofalchemists
